subParams.name: current_page
subParams.description: Current page of products to be needed. The default page is page 1.

subParams.name: excepted_product_ids
subParams.description: Product Ids which needs to be excluded

subParams.name: off_line_time
subParams.description: Search field by expiration date. For example, if the value for expiration date is 3, it means to query products to be offline within 3 days.

subParams.name: page_size
subParams.description: Number of products to be queried at each page. The input value must be less than 100, the default value of which is 20.

subParams.name: product_status_type
subParams.description: onSelling	Product operation status. Currently, it is divided into 4 types with the following input parameters respectively: onSelling; offline; auditing; and editingRequired.

subParams.name: subject
subParams.description: Fuzzy search field by product subject. It only supports half-width numbers in English with a length not more than 128.

subParams.name: ws_display
subParams.description: Reasons for product offline: expire_offline; user_offline; violate_offline; punish_offline; and degrade_offline.

subParams.name: have_national_quote
subParams.description: Whether having national quotation. "y" for yes, "n" for no.

subParams.name: group_id
subParams.description: Search field by product groups. Enter product group id (groupId).

subParams.name: gmt_create_start
subParams.description: Search for products created after a specific time, format: yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss

subParams.name: gmt_create_end
subParams.description: Search for products created before a specific time，yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss

subParams.name: gmt_modified_start
subParams.description: Search for product modified after a specific time，yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss

subParams.name: gmt_modified_end
subParams.description: Search for products modified before a specific time，yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss

subParams.name: product_min_price
subParams.description: min price among all skus of the product

subParams.name: product_max_price
subParams.description: max price among all skus of the product
